thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 19 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Net Gaming To Acquire Assets In The DACH Region

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Net Gaming To Acquire Assets In The DACH Region
text:
April 19 (Reuters) - Net Gaming Europe AB:
* NET GAMING SIGNS LETTER OF INTENT TO ACQUIRE ASSETS IN THE DACH REGION
* SIGNED A LETTER OF INTENT TO ACQUIRE AFFILIATE ASSETS, PRIMARILY IN DACH REGION
* OPERATIONS SHOW STRONG GROWTH AND ARE CURRENTLY EXPECTED TO GENERATE QUARTERLY SALES OF APPROXIMATELY EUR 200,000
* INITIAL PURCHASE CONSIDERATION OF EUR 2.29 MILLION WILL BE SETTLED WITH EXISTING CASH RESOURCES
* PAYMENT OF A MAXIMUM ADDITIONAL CONSIDERATION OF EUR 1.25 MILLION MAY ALSO BE REQUIRED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
